summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Bothell Way, from East 85th Street to 10th Avenue Northeast; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by the installation of a street lighting system, all in accordance with Resolution No. 8822 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
